page.title: 14My Pets
page.content: My sister and I both own a white mouse. We keep them in large cages which have to be cleaned out regularly otherwise there is a nasty smell. We use sawdust and newspaper for the bottom of the cage and warm fluffy cotton-wool for their bed. Other people own cats,dogs,hamsters gerbils,tortoises or goldfish. Small pets are more suitable for a town be- cause they don't need a great deal of exercise or acres of grass to eat like a horse. My grandma has a cat because she likes to talk to it when she is alone. Some old people who live alone in the area have a dog who will bark when people come to the door,but dogs should be walked several times a day and not all old people can manage to take them to the parks. Small birds like budgerigars are also kept for companionship.
